price: And We have made therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines, and caused springs to gush forth,
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا جَنَّٰتٖ مِّن نَّخِيلٖ وَأَعۡنَٰبٖ وَفَجَّرۡنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡعُيُونِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
